name: vox-agents
description: LLM-powered strategic AI agents for Civilization V that provide high-level decision making and strategy planning through the Vox Deorum system.

scripts.build: node ../node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc && cd ui && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:dist --
scripts.briefer: npm run build && npm run briefer:dist --
scripts.strategist: npm run build && npm run strategist:dist --
scripts.telepathist: npm run build && npm run telepathist:dist --
